subject: Freestyle Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: After a delicate operation to repair her spine, which she injured in a training run, the Olympic ski cross racer Maria Komissarova was in “grave but stable” condition, doctors said.
snippet: After a delicate operation to repair her spine, which she injured in a training run, the Olympic ski cross racer Maria Komissarova was in “grave but stable” condition, doctors said.
